data.text:
Drew Ryder Smith is an inevitable successful artist with a plethora of accomplishments in the music industry. Equipped to being a country music artist in his hometown of the “City Of Music”

(Nashville,TN), he has award-winning songwriter, producer and company owner to add to his belt. Growing up in his hometown of Nashville. His music career has hit the charts with his singles ‘Exes’ and ‘The Truth” being added to Spotify playlists of “Most Added Radio Plays”. He has had delightful opportunities to open up for award-winning artists like Big & Rich, Lee Brice, and Lady A. Country superstars would be extremely lucky to have Drew Ryder Smith As support. A dream came true when he performed at the Ryman Auditorium to open up for legend Merle Haggard with artists like Keith Urban, Tim McGraw, Faith Hill and others in the crowd.

Not only has he hit the ball out of the park with his successes, he has had marvelous connection in the song-writing field as well. The amount of big name artists he has gotten to write and have #1 singles with is extremely impressive. He blew it out of the water when he helped write ‘Some of it” by Eric Church with Bobby Pinson.

15 years into the music business, Drew Ryder Smith has also been blessed to be the owner of Gray Sound Recording Services, LLC in Nashville, TN, as he delivers being a producer and senior engineer. Drew Ryder Smith has done it all and he does not plan to stop. Join him and follow along as his career continues to grow further.

Listen to his newest release ‘The Bottom Of It’ on Spotify https://open.spotify.com/artist/01ivNicPeISSLmDXpWakJK
